name: v3.5.0
body:
## What's Changed
* when --node-ip provided, use that as first InternalIP by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/297
* switch to DaemonSet to run on all control plane nodes by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/310
* enable leader-elect by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/311
* rename deployment.yaml to daemonset.yaml in Helm and remove extraneous field by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/313
* bump to go 1.19, which is a prerequisite for many dependency upgrades by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/318
* k8s.io/* to v0.25.0 by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/320
* Bump github.com/packethost/packngo from 0.24.0 to 0.25.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/289
* bump k8s.io components to v0.24.2 by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/295
* Bump k8s.io/cloud-provider from 0.24.2 to 0.24.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/300
* Bump k8s.io/cloud-provider from 0.24.3 to 0.24.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/307

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/compare/v3.4.3...v3.5.0

name: v3.4.3
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump github.com/packethost/packngo from 0.22.0 to 0.23.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/262
* Bump docker/setup-buildx-action from 1 to 2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/276
* fix misplaced quotemark by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/267
* Bump golangci/golangci-lint-action from 3.1.0 to 3.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/277
* Bump docker/login-action from 1 to 2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/273
* Bump docker/build-push-action from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/275
* Bump docker/setup-qemu-action from 1 to 2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/274
* k8s v0.24.0 by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/278
* document --cloud-provider args for 1.23+ by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/265
* document how to build images, move local run into dev doc by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/266
* use returned BGP settings from API by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/264
* Bump github.com/packethost/packngo from 0.23.0 to 0.24.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/279
* Revert "document --cloud-provider args for 1.23+" by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/280
* filter out controlplane EIP from loadbalancer services by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/288
* include namespace in metallb address-pool name by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/287
* Bump k8s.io/api from 0.24.0 to 0.24.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/285
* Bump k8s.io/cloud-provider from 0.24.0 to 0.24.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/284


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/compare/v3.4.2...v3.4.3

name: v3.4.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump k8s.io/api from 0.23.5 to 0.23.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/256

name: v3.4.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README to reflect current control loop by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/245
* Enable the CCM to come up before node is ready so it can assign EIP. by @cprivitere in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/246
* Fix reading of annotation names from config file by @jvassev in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/248
* Update automated workflow to allow for overriding orgs for dockerhub and quay by @detiber in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/250
* Bump actions/setup-go from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/251
* fix metallb matchlabels to be valid by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/249

## New Contributors
* @cprivitere made their first contribution in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/246
* @jvassev made their first contribution in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/248

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/compare/v3.4.0...v3.4.1

name: v3.4.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Implement Instances v2 by @displague in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/185
* Fix link to Control Plane Load Balancing in README.md by @robertvolkmann in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/219
* report versions correctly by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/221
* Clean logging by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/220
* set programName rendered in `--version` output by @displague in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/223
* support source IP from metallb by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/225
* use labels and env vars to set EIP metro or facility, else error by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/222
* use external copy of DCO in CONTRIBUTING.md by @displague in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/227
* do not log EM device objects which may contain sensitive fields by @displague in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/228
* use standard API LoadBalancers by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/224
* move all of informers into single place that uses it by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/229
* General cleanup and updating dependencies by @detiber in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/231
* Fix issue with services controller when load balancing should be disabled by @detiber in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/232
* Refactor EIP handling by @detiber in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/230
* Refactor test and release workflows by @detiber in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/234
* Bump actions/cache from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/236
* Bump github.com/google/uuid from 1.1.2 to 1.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/238
* Bump k8s.io/cloud-provider from 0.23.4 to 0.23.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/240
* Bump github.com/hashicorp/go-retryablehttp from 0.6.6 to 0.7.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/237
* document requirements for e2e tests by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/235

## New Contributors
* @robertvolkmann made their first contribution in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/219

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/compare/v3.3.0...v3.4.0

name: Release v3.3.0
body:
## What's Changed
* wrong use of variadic by @vasu1124 in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/205
* document bring-your-own-IP by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/196
* deploy/template: also tolerate node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane taint by @flokli in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/209
* recognize control plane nodes with old or new labels by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/211
* switch annotation structure to support patterns and multiple by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/204
* Bump k8s.io/kubernetes from 1.19.4 to 1.19.11 by @dependabot in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/203
* manage identical-except-for-name metallb address pools by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/208
* clean up some tests and add some more by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/212
* Add explicit metro support by @deitch in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/214

## New Contributors
* @vasu1124 made their first contribution in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/205
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/203

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/compare/v3.2.2...v3.3.0

* rename METAL_LB to METAL_LOAD_BALANCER by @flokli in https://github.com/equinix/cloud-provider-equinix-metal/pull/186

name: Release v3.0.1
body:
## Fixes

* #143 fix log verbosity options
* #140 exit on failed service startup, previous behavior would idle silently on a failed startup
* #148 kube-vip loadbalancer settings were not detected properly, preventing it from being enabled

name: Release v2.0.0
body:
v2.0.0 is a significant update from the v1 series. See also, https://metal.canny.io/changelog/kubernetes-ccm-improvements.

MetalLB is no longer managed, bring your own MetalLB or install it with CCM manifests and Packet CCM will manage the configmap for MetalLB.

See https://github.com/packethost/packet-ccm#get-equinix-metal-project-id-and-api-token for installation instructions, from Loadbalancer and BGP configuration to the `Secret` format for Packet credentials.

## Changes

- reliable Elastic IP for control plane load balancing without additional work
- reliable enabling of BGP on projects
- bug fixes: annotations on nodes, RBAC authentication fixes, lost errors, release issues
- support for multiple bgp peers, enabling us to work correctly in the new Equinix IBX facilities
- separate deployment of metallb load balancer, for better control and easier deployment
- BGP API endpoint error handling
- add option to configure and control metallb, when deployed separately
- regular sync updates for all changes, to ensure we can recover from missed updates
- support for expansive configmap, easing support of other formats
